page.title: 13Transport
page.content: The A30 runs through the block which makes most places accessible to local people. Most people work outside the area and go to their place of work by car.Many people share transport to keep costs down. There are no secondary schools in this block therefore all children over the age of 11 have to travel out of the area to go to school.They go to Wincanton School by school bus.Those going to Yeovil have to depend on public transport. The bus service is considered to be adequate for a rural area,there are busses every hour to Yeovil but these stop running at 7.30pm.There are 2 busses per day to Wincanton. There is a British Rail station in Sherborne and a National Coach station in Yeovil.
